name: Indentured Spirit
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.Incorporeal Movement: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.Withering Touch: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.
